levels.description: ASPD <@ba.vup>+{attack_speed}</>, attack <@ba.vup>1</> additional target; when this unit and the allied Operator with highest ATK within range deal damage to an enemy, additionally deal <@ba.vup>{ep_damage_ratio:0%}</> ATK as <$ba.dt.apoptosis2>Necrosis damage</>
